Our aesthetic medicine center

Why choose our aesthetic medicine center?

At Tatiana Leal Aesthetic and Laser Medicine, we are a group of professionals prepared to offer high-quality standards in both facial and body treatments, to improve the physical appearance and quality of life of our patients. Our main objective: to enhance the beauty of our patients while caring for their health. Meet our team

Knowledge

Our director, Dr. Tatiana Leal, a specialist in Aesthetic and Laser Medicine from Universidad del Rosario, has the scientific background and has been practicing aesthetic medicine since 2009.

At the forefront

In addition, she is constantly updating her academic knowledge to provide the latest global trends in facial and body treatments.
